name: 工程數學（一）
goals: Realize theoretical concepts, professional terminologies and solve problems of engineering mathematics.
syllabus:
Week 1          : Introduction

Week 1-3       : First order ordinary differential equation (ODE)

Week 4-6       : High order differential equation

Week 7          : Midterm examination

Week 8          : Linear DE systems

Week 9-10    : Laplace transform

Week 11-12   : Laplace transform for solving differntial equation

Week 13        : Fourier transform

Week 14        : Final examination

Week 15~16   : Final report

The last two weeks are used for the students to review the lectures and prepare the final report in paper formats (if necessary).

methodologies.note: Powerpoint slides based on the reference books

grading.note: Each group will give final presentations that introduce the applications of EM in EE domain

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
